utilCmdArgs: -c 'tmsh modify /sys global-settings mgmt-dhcp disabled; tmsh delete /sys management-route default; tmsh delete /sys management-ip ${mgmt_ip}/24; tmsh create /sys management-ip ${mgmt_ip}/24; tmsh create /auth partition LOCAL_ONLY; tmsh modify /sys folder /LOCAL_ONLY device-group none traffic-group /Common/traffic-group-local-only; tmsh create /net route /LOCAL_ONLY/default network default gw ${gw}; tmsh create /sys management-route /LOCAL_ONLY/default network default gateway ${mgmt_gw}; tmsh create /sys management-route /LOCAL_ONLY/aws_API_route network 169.254.169.254 gateway ${mgmt_gw}'
